description: Returns the list of available instance images, or blueprints. You can use a blueprint to create a new instance already running a specific operating system, as well as a preinstalled app or development stack. The software each instance is running depends on the blueprint image you choose.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The token to advance to the next page of results from your request. To get a page token, perform an initial GetBlueprints request. If your results are paginated, the response will return a next page token that you can specify as the page token in a subsequent request.

parameters.name: appCategory
parameters.description: Returns a list of blueprints that are specific to Lightsail for Research.

nested_items.name: blueprints
nested_items.description: An array of key-value pairs that contains information about the available blueprints.

nested_items.name: blueprintId
nested_items.description: The ID for the virtual private server image ( app_wordpress_x_x or app_lamp_x_x).

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The friendly name of the blueprint ( Amazon Linux).

nested_items.name: group
nested_items.description: The group name of the blueprint ( amazon-linux).

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the blueprint ( os or app).

nested_items.name: isActive
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the blueprint is active. Inactive blueprints are listed to support customers with existing instances but are not necessarily available for launch of new instances. Blueprints are marked inactive when they become outdated due to operating system updates or new application releases.

nested_items.name: minPower
nested_items.description: The minimum bundle power required to run this blueprint. For example, you need a bundle with a power value of 500 or more to create an instance that uses a blueprint with a minimum power value of 500. 0 indicates that the blueprint runs on all instance sizes.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version number of the operating system, application, or stack ( 2016.03.0).

nested_items.name: productUrl
nested_items.description: The product URL to learn more about the image or blueprint.

nested_items.name: licenseUrl
nested_items.description: The end-user license agreement URL for the image or blueprint.

nested_items.name: platform
nested_items.description: The operating system platform (either Linux/Unix-based or Windows Server-based) of the blueprint.

nested_items.name: appCategory
nested_items.description: Virtual computer blueprints that are supported by Lightsail for Research.

nested_items.name: nextPageToken
nested_items.description: The token to advance to the next page of results from your request.
